蕩.definition: to wash; to squander; to sweep away; to move; to shake; dissolute; pond

蕩氣回腸.definition: heart-rending (drama, music, poem etc); deeply moving

蕩然.definition: vanished from the face of the earth; all gone; nothing left

蕩然無存.definition: to obliterate completely; to vanish from the face of the earth
